attributes.action: Bid to host the 2018 Football World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bye 2018 England will not have hosted a world cup for 52 years.Which is far to long for such a dominating force in world football.We have high quality stadiums such as Wembley, Old Trafford, The Emirates, St James and in 2018,Liverpool will have a new stadium.Also Chelsea and West Ham have plans for new stadiums.So do the right thing,bring the world cup to England.And who knows we did win it last time!
